verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Oh, it's good to know that we
Are finally set free
By the birth of the Father in His sons.
And now we are enjoying
The blessing of His wellspring
As we move in the oneness of His Son.
Chorus:
I've got glory comin' at me from both sides.
I've got glory flowin' over me in tides.
I've got glory shinin' on me like sunshine, it seems
And it's You, my Father, beloved guide.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
We speak His Word throughout the land
As we sit as His right hand
Our names are written in the book with His blood.
As we move in unity,
We shall set the captives free
And we long to hear the words,
Well done my son.
